thread.title: First time in New York - Review
thread.title_full: First time in New York - Review of Holiday Inn Express New York - Manhattan West Side, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jpferre47
title: First time in New York - Review
text:
We really enjoyed our stay in the city that never sleep !
Many thanks to all the staff specially to Josie and Yannek for the warm welcome and all the precious advices ! it was great to share a nice smile with you every morning and evening.
The room was very clean and perfect for the three of us well equiped(free wifi great for my son to keep in touch with his mates in France)
Breakfast delicious so many things to taste ( cookie fruit pancake etc)
Bus just around the corner for Central park and subway 10 mn away by walk
Port terminal authority to take our bus to newark airport was 10 mn away by walk
A BIENTOT (see you soon)
jp mag charles
